content: On August 18th, 2011, Grahame published the initial strawman version of FHIR. The date on that initial version was August 11th - see blogpost http://www.ringholm.com/column/FHIR_5_years.htm for a bit of history .. who knows where FHIR will lead us in the next 5 years.
Love the blog, it's on
@René Spronk great article! FHIR has become a strong brand name, sounds much better than RFH ;p
